item.title: Docker built-in container support for .NET 7
item.description: On 14th September 2022, Microsoft announced .NET 7 Release Candidate 1, the first of two release candidates (RC) for .NET 7 that are supported in production. The .NET 7 launch is scheduled for November 8-10, 2022 on the .NET Conf 2022! Until then we can try some of the new features and improvements of this new .NET release! Among several new and interesting features, one that I particularly liked and would like to highlight here is just the docker built-in container support for .
